Bibliographic References: Greco Pontrandolfo, Dial, di Arch. n.s. 1, 1979/2, p. 38, fig. 10 (tomb group)
Imagery Description: Young satyr with thyrsus in 1. hand, 'skewer of fruit' and fillet in r. moving to r.
Additional Notes: Goes closely with the squat lekythos 21193 (no. 711), from the same tomb.
Artist: Minor Vases from the AsteasNon SepcifiedPython Workshop
